verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when <S%H261>Ehud<s%> was <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> that <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2674>Hazor;<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of whose <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H2800>Harosheth<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he had <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> he <S%H2393>mightily<s%> <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And <S%H1683>Deborah,<s%> a <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H3941>Lapidoth,<s%> she <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at that <S%H6256>time.<s%>

And she <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8560>palm<s%> tree of <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to her for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

And she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> out of <S%H6943>Kedeshnaphtali,<s%> <S%H5321><s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Has not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> saying, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H4900>draw<s%> toward <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> with you <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun?<s%>

And I will <S%H4900>draw<s%> to you to the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7028>Kishon<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2985>Jabin's<s%> <S%H6635>army,<s%> with his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and his <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H518>If<s%> you will <S%H3212>go<s%> with me, then I will <S%H1980>go:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H3212>go<s%> with me, then I will not <S%H3212>go.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> I will surely <S%H3212>go<s%> with you: <S%H657>notwithstanding<s%> the <S%H1870>journey<s%> that you <S%H1980>take<s%> shall not be for your <S%H8597>honor;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H802>woman.<s%> And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H1301>Barak<s%> to <S%H6943>Kedesh.<s%>

And <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H2199>called<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> to <S%H6943>Kedesh;<s%> and he <S%H5927>went<s%> up with <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet:<s%> and <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up with him.

Now <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7014>Kenite,<s%> which was of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2246>Hobab<s%> the <S%H2859>father<s%> in <S%H2859>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> had <S%H6504>severed<s%> himself from the <S%H7017>Kenites,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> to the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H6815>Zaanaim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by <S%H6943>Kedesh.<s%>
And they <S%H5046>showed<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> that <S%H1301>Barak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H42>Abinoam<s%> was <S%H5927>gone<s%> up to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor.<s%>

And <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H2199>gathered<s%> together <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> even <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him, from <S%H2800>Harosheth<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> to the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H7028>Kishon.<s%>

And <S%H1683>Deborah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1301>Barak,<s%> Up; for <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> is not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>gone<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> you? So <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4264>host,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1301>Barak;<s%> so that <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H3381>lighted<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>off<s%> his <S%H4818>chariot,<s%> and <S%H5127>fled<s%> away on his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

But <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4264>host,<s%> to <S%H2800>Harosheth<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and there was not a man <S%H7604>left.<s%>

However, <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> away on his <S%H7272>feet<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H3278>Jael<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite:<s%> for there was <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenite.<s%>

And <S%H3278>Jael<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H5493>Turn<s%> in, my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H5493>turn<s%> in to me; <S%H3372>fear<s%> not. And when he had <S%H5493>turned<s%> in to her into the <S%H168>tent,<s%> she <S%H3680>covered<s%> him with a <S%H8063>mantle.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, Give me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink;<s%> for I am <S%H6770>thirsty.<s%> And she <S%H6605>opened<s%> a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> of <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and gave him <S%H8248>drink,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> him.

Again he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H5975>Stand<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and it shall be, <S%H518>when<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> does <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of you, and <S%H559>say,<s%> Is there any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6311>here?<s%> that you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H369>No.<s%>

Then <S%H3278>Jael<s%> <S%H2268>Heber's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H3489>nail<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H7760>took<s%> an <S%H4718>hammer<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3814>softly<s%> to him, and <S%H8628>smote<s%> the <S%H3489>nail<s%> into his <S%H7541>temples,<s%> and <S%H6795>fastened<s%> it into the <S%H776>ground:<s%> for he was fast <S%H7290>asleep<s%> and <S%H5774>weary.<s%> So he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> as <S%H1301>Barak<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> <S%H3278>Jael<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and I will <S%H7200>show<s%> you the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H1245>seek.<s%> And when he <S%H935>came<s%> into her tent, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H5516>Sisera<s%> <S%H5307>lay<s%> <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and the <S%H3489>nail<s%> was in his <S%H7541>temples.<s%>
So <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3665>subdued<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>prospered,<s%> and <S%H7186>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they had <S%H3772>destroyed<s%> <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
